text: Duncan Snidal, FBA is professor of international relations at Nuffield College, University of Oxford. Snidal has research interests in international relations theory, institutional organizations, cooperation, international law, and rational choice.Prof Duncan Snidal. Nuffield College. Retrieved 28 May 2015.http://www.politics.ox.ac.uk/academic-faculty/duncan-snidal.html ==Selected publications== *Institutional Choice in Global Commerce: Governance Strategies from the 19th Century to the Present (with Joseph Jupille and Walter), Cambridge University Press, 2013. *"Organization without Delegation: Informal intergovernmental organizations (IIGOs)" (with Felicity Vabulas) Review of International Organizations 8, 2: 193-220. 2013. *"Taking Responsive Regulation Transnational: Strategies for International Organizations" (with Kenneth Abbott). Regulation and Governance 7: 95-113. 2013. *Oxford Handbook on International Relations (with Christian Reus-Smit, eds.). Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2009. == References == Category:Fellows of Nuffield College, Oxford Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:British political scientists Category:Fellows of the British Academy
